snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes an examination of the future of money, a dating couple finding common ground with an online video game and...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes an examination of the future of money, a dating couple finding common ground with an online video game and Twitter's reaction to Facebook's purchase of Instagram.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: IKEA TV and a Google Rival
